item.description:
At this time, not sure if Alton Bay Iceport will be open or not, but let's get it on the books.

 

Hotline number is 603- 875-3498

 

Here's a rare opportunity to land on an ice port. Is it fun and exciting? A MUST DO for pilots. Even more rarer than the Corridor trip!

 

We should always have an alternate when going to B18. Maybe back to Nashua KASH, would be a smart alternate. Or LCI, but no food there.

 

Food is also at B18! there and the place can get busy.

B18 is the ICAO. Might not find it on your GPS.

Article from AOPA can be found here  athttp://www.aopa.org/aircraft/articles/2010/100114altonbay.html

 

Our new policy on Fly Outs. Please use your ability to Fill a Seat or Find a Seat. It's up to the pilots and pax's to fill em up.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Alton Bay Ice Port visit
